name: Run N Roll
description:
Created for GMTK Game Jam.

Theme: Roll of the Dice

A fast paced parkour styled game, where the dice chooses your level. In order to win you must complete all 6 levels. 

Each level is different from one another, one may trap you inside the dark dungeon, while another might be flying through the skies.

Controls: 

WASD to move 

Space to jump (double jumping) 

C to slide
